channel.title: I need help with spawns
channel.description:
I need help changing my new user log in spawn. I am editing the home place and put it in a different area. And I want new users to spawn there when they log in the first time. Where would I find the coding to change the x and y coordinates?
All help would be greatly appreciated!

item.title: I need help with spawns
item.dc:creator: @Pure_str433 Pure str433
item.description:
@Pure_str433 wrote:

  1. Stand on the spot that you log in, and get the coordinates. Note them down.

  2. Open up client.java and search for either the X or the Y coordinate.

  3. When you find your match of BOTH of them in the brackets (####, ####, 0) or similar, then change these to the one coordinates you wish to use.

Laid it out a little easier… I presume you are using a 317?

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with spawns
item.dc:creator: @austinsobes austinsobes
item.description:
@austinsobes wrote:

Do you know what I should search up? because there is a lot of coordinates. and I wouldn’t know which one is which.
I know how to get coordinates and stuff. I already changed my ::home command. I just need to FIND the right patch of coding. But I have no clue, I never got to this part in programming before.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with spawns
item.dc:creator: @Pure_str433 Pure str433
item.description:
@Pure_str433 wrote:

::mypos ingame gives the X and Y co-ordinates

Client.java will be the location of the x and y co-ordinates when they log in.

Ctrl+F to find

Read full topic
